document_data.name: Bertrand Carrathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Bertrand Carrathal''' was High King of [[Callidyrr]] in the latter half of the 11{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} Like his predecessors, although he held the title of High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]], he was considered to be merely a figurehead by the [[Ffolk]] outside of Callidyrr.
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Carrathal Dynasty]] via his marriage to [[Yolanda Carrathal]]. The pair had multiple children, and Bertrand's eventual successor was their third son, [[Edwin Carrathal I|Edwin]].
document_data.History:
Bertram ruled in Callidyrr first as king at the side of his wife, who became monarch in the {{YearlinkName|1052}}, and then as High King following her death in the {{YearlinkName|1089}}.

His solo reign lasted for six years before he died of natural causes in the {{YearlinkName|1095}}.
